title: Redberry pie

properties.name: description
properties.value: Redberry pies are a type of pie that can be obtained by baking an uncooked berry pie on a cooking range, requiring level 10 Cooking and granting 78 experience when successful. Players may burn the pie while baking one, resulting in a burnt pie; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 45 on ranges. Alternatively, casting the Bake Pie spell from the lunar spellbook guarantees successful baking of all pies.

SMW Subobject for HalfHigh Alchemy value: 3Examine: So tasty I kept some for later.Is members only: falseIs variant of: Redberry pieUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Half a redberry pie.pngWeight: 0.225Value: 6Version anchor: HalfRelease date: 17 March 2001Item ID: 2333

Redberry pies are a type of pie that can be obtained by baking an uncooked berry pie on a cooking range, requiring level 10 Cooking and granting 78 experience when successful. Players may burn the pie while baking one, resulting in a burnt pie; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 45 on ranges. Alternatively, casting the Bake Pie spell from the lunar spellbook guarantees successful baking of all pies.

Redberry pie heals 10 Hitpoints in total, 2 bites each healing 5. After eating it, a pie dish will remain.

In The Knight's Sword quest, one must be given to Thurgo, the Imcando dwarf who lives near Mudskipper Point, as a "present" to have him make a blurite sword.

A second redberry pie must be given to Thurgo at any point so that during The Giant Dwarf quest he will fix a Dwarven battleaxe.

Romily Weaklax, in the Cooks' Guild, may ask the player for a redberry pie, paying 90 coins each. They do not have to be made by the player to get the reward.

A redberry pie may be given to Ramarno for some dialogue.

Redberry pies can be purchased from the Cooks' Guild Pie Shop for 12 coins.

  1. ^ The ticks increase to 4 when using the Make-X functionality.
Steps
1. Use pastry dough on a pie dish to make a pie shell
2. Use a redberry on the pie shell to make an uncooked berry pie
3. Cook the uncooked berry pie on a range to finish a redberry pie

Players may burn the pie while baking one, resulting in a [[burnt pie]]; the [[burn rate]] while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at [[Cooking]] level 45 on ranges. Alternatively, casting the [[Bake Pie]] spell from the [[lunar spellbook]] guarantees successful baking of all pies. Redberry pie heals 10 [[Hitpoints]] in total, 2 bites each healing 5. After eating it, a [[pie dish]] will remain. In [[The Knight's Sword]] [[quest]], one must be given to [[Thurgo]], the [[Imcando dwarf]] who lives near [[Mudskipper Point]], as a "present" to have him make a [[blurite sword]]. A second redberry pie must be given to Thurgo at any point so that during [[The Giant Dwarf]] quest he will fix a [[Dwarven battleaxe]]. [[Romily Weaklax]], in the [[Cooks' Guild]], may ask the player for a redberry pie, paying {{NoCoins|90}} coins each. They do not have to be made by the player to get the reward. A redberry pie may be given to [[Ramarno]] for some dialogue.
